Html:
Hello,

I recently wanted to try and use RAWR available on elitistjerks but ive run into a bit of a snag. It will not load. There is no Grey background no loading percentage in the middle, nothing. I have tried it on Chrome and IE 32-bit. I have reloaded the page many times, deleted cookies/cashe, reinstalled silverlight many times, etc.

Update: It loaded for me once at random. I havent been able to do it since.

 

Thank you.

Sky.
